alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 7:47AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF THE SOUTHERN WIND RIVER BASIN...EAST SWEETWATER COUNTY...GREEN MOUNTAINS AND RATTLESNAKE RANGE...AND SOUTHERN LANDER FOOTHILLS... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 747 AM MST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Sand Draw to 11 miles south of Wamsutter and moving northeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This band of heavy snow will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Wind River Basin, northeastern East Sweetwater County, central Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and southeastern Lander Foothills Counties. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 152 and 198. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin
